AUTHOR: Ridinginstyle
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to duel with someone else. May be laggy depending on internet speed of the hoster as the bot sends alot of messages (compensates by adding a delay between each action)!
NAME: Duels
INSTALL_MSG:
`[p]duels` is the big one for this cog. It shows mostly all the commands needed to work it. 
NOTE: You MUST do `[p]tjoin` to activate the bot on that specific server

To actually duel just do `[p]duel @mention @mention`!
